page.title: 10SYNAGOGUES NEAR PRESTWICH
page.content: The area has many such houses of worship.A typical building will have a mens' section downstairs and a ladies' gallery above.The services are held three times a day but the biggest attendance is on the{Sabbath}and festivals,when large congregations have a {Cantor}with a choir and others have laymen taking the services. In the front, is the Ark a cupboard containing the {Holy Scrolls},draped with velvet and adorned with silver, from which the {Cantor}reads a weekly portion. {Synagogues}often hold youth clubs in the adjoining rooms.A hall is attached to the {Synagogue}which can be hired for functions.Funds are raised to support its upkeep.Weekly lectures are given and on the{Sabbath} the {Rabbi}gives a sermon.
